metrics.label: YoY %
metrics.sql_expr: (value / lag(value) over (partition by series_key order by time) - 1) * 100

visuals.title: Latest value
visuals.sql: SELECT time, value FROM fact_observations WHERE dataset_code='env_wat_cat' ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

visuals.title: Trend over time
visuals.sql: SELECT time, geo, value FROM fact_observations WHERE dataset_code='env_wat_cat' ORDER BY time

visuals.title: Top geographies (latest)
visuals.sql:
WITH t AS (SELECT max(time) AS t FROM fact_observations WHERE dataset_code='env_wat_cat')
SELECT geo, value FROM fact_observations WHERE dataset_code='env_wat_cat' AND time=(SELECT t FROM t) ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 25
